'ATP Oil & Gas Corporation' is a Houston, Texas based company that develops and
produces oil and natural gas in the Gulf of Mexico and the North Sea. It
specializes in developing reserves. ATP trades on the NASDAQ Global Select
Market under the symbol ATPG.
categories: Oil companies of the United States
